# NSAttributedString.TextLayoutSectionKey

**Structure**

Constants for the text layout sections document attribute key.

## Declaration

```swift
struct TextLayoutSectionKey
```

## Overview

Use these constants as values for the [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString/DocumentAttributeKey/textLayoutSections] key in the document attributes dictionary.

## Getting keys for text layouts

- **orientation**: The orientation of the text.
- **range**: The character range.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a text layout section key with the specified raw value.

## Getting document-wide attributes

- **NSAttributedString.DocumentAttributeKey**: The attributes you apply to an entire document.
- **NSAttributedString.DocumentReadingOptionKey**: Options for constructing an attributed string from data you read from disk.
- **HTML attributes**: Documentwide attributes that provide control over the form of generated HTML.
- **NSAttributedString.DocumentType**: Constants for the document type document attribute key.
- **NSTextScalingType**: Constants that specify the text scaling.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
